static & factory ($template)

Detailed Description

Mail class. Holds an Mtpl object so mails can be handled just like Module templates Sent mails can be stored as log files (or not), mailed (or not), and also mailed to only one static recipient (for testing purpose) depending on the configuration options setup in the PEAR::getStaticProperty('Mail','global')
